entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending early this morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle. Blowing snow at times this morning and early this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 4 May 2023
